quagga.input.subject: Re: Third Party Trading Platform Policy
quagga.input.body:
Ann K is working on this now.  Thanks.  Mark



	Mark Greenberg@ENRON
	02/28/2001 09:52 AM
		 
		 To: Mark E Haedicke/HOU/ECT@ECT
		 cc: Mark Taylor/HOU/ECT@ECT
		 Subject: Third Party Trading Platform Policy

Mark -

I was reviewing information Leslie had left behind and was curious if you 
ever had a chance to review and approve the Third Party Platform Policy that 
Leslie had prepared?  If not, I have attached a version of the policy below 
for your review.

The only change I see that needs to be made is the replacement of Leslie's 
name with mine.

Please let me know if you should need anything further.




Mark
Senior Counsel, ENA
Phone:     713-345-8897
Facsimile: 713-646-3940
E-Mail:      Mark.Greenberg@enron.com
